title: Drug addiction, unemployment behind rising youth suicides in Afghan provinces
description:
Kabul [Afghanistan], June 30 (ANI): At least two recent cases of suicide in Nangarhar and Kandahar provinces have brought renewed focus on growing mental health issues among Afghan youth, with drug addiction, domestic violence, and unemployment cited as leading causes, TOLO News reported.
